description: Porsche has apparently been working on a six-stroke engine and even filed a patent with the United States Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) along with the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca. The motor is said to offer enhanced efficiency and power, along with cleaner combustion. However, it’s fairly common for the industry to promise the moon after announcing the revival of odd-ball technologies from the past or some totally novel powertrain.
author: Matt Posky

title: Chevrolet Colorado Trims Engine Options for 2025 Model Year
description: General Motors is reducing the available engine options for the Chevy Colorado, leaving the pickup with just one. However, that powertrain is the 2.7-liter turbocharged TurboMax offering 310 horsepower and 430 pound-feet of torque. While obviously the most exciting powertrain on offer, streamlining the model does reduce consumer choice and will likely raise MSRPs.
author: Matt Posky

description: Flying cars are a thing, though it’s hard to imagine a world where they become anything slightly resembling mainstream. author: Chris Teague

description: Despite the abundance of attention members of the automotive media pay to performance vehicles, the truth is that they don’t sell anywhere near the numbers that more mainstream cars do. Subaru, which had seen consistent sales growth with its BRZ and WRX over the last year, is finding that out the hard way, as it recently posted numbers that don’t look great for either car .
author: Chris Teague

title: Ford Just Gave BlueCruise a Significant Price Cut
description: Many automakers are pushing forward with advanced hands-free driver assistance features, but buyers often face a harsh reality when the free trial period runs out and it’s time to pay for a subscription. description: Electric vehicles don’t catch on fire at a higher rate than gas models, but when they do, it can be a real hassle to extinguish the flames. While some EV fires can be attributed to collisions and other damage, flooding can also cause problems, especially saltwater. That’s the issue faced by thousands of EV owners in the Southeast, where Hurricane Helene just left a massive path of destruction and chaos.

The Cadillac marketing people justified their grandiose claims because in addition to a visual rework, the Eldorado changed its manufacturing location. It moved upmarket (shedding the two-year DeVille association) and joined the exclusive Fleetwood assembly line with the Sixty Special and Seventy-Five models. title: QOTD: What Freebie Enticed You to Take a Test Drive?
description: The idea of getting a freebie if you test drive a car is nothing new.
author: Tim Healey

title: 2025 Can-Am Pulse And Origin Review -- Choice Awaits
description: After a decades-long absence, Can-Am motorcycles have returned to market. But rather than attempting to revive the Rotax-powered 2-stroke dirt bikes it was known for in the 1970s, the brand has opted to launch a pair of Rotax-powered e-bikes offering more versatility. The Can-Am Pulse is a nimble urban commuter, whereas the Origin is designed to handle basically any terrain you throw beneath its wheels.
author: Matt Posky

title: 3,100-Mile 2012 Lexus LFA
description: This 2012 Lexus LFA is #063 of 500 built during a two-year production run and was initially delivered to New Country Lexus of Latham in New York. It remained with one owner until it was acquired by the selling dealer in 2024 and now has 3,100 miles. Power is provided by a 4.8-liter V10 linked with a six-speed Automated Sequential Gearbox and a Torsen limited-slip differential. The carbon-composite bodywork is finished in Pearl White, and the interior is trimmed in Cream leather, which extends to the center console, dashboard, door panels, and steering wheel. Equipment includes 20" mesh-spoke BBS Nürburgring Edition alloy wheels, bi-xenon headlights, and carbon-ceramic brake rotors with yellow Brembo calipers in addition to heated power-adjustable seats, a back-up camera, a Mark Levinson audio system, and a Lexus Insider infotainment system with voice command and navigation. This LFA is now offered in New York by the selling dealer with the removed wheels and tires, a luggage set, a Scott Pruett-signed pair of gloves, a bottle of wine from Pruett Vineyard, service records, a copy of the window sticker, and a clean Maryland title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2024 Porsche 911 GT3 RS Weissach
description: This 2024 Porsche 911 GT3 RS was purchased new by the seller at Ray Catena Porsche of Edison, New Jersey, and was optioned from the factory with the Weissach Package, which reduced weight by utilizing a carbon-composite roof panel, front lid, anti-roll bars, and interior trim. Powered by a 4.0-liter flat-six that drives the rear wheels through a seven-speed PDK dual-clutch automatic transaxle and an electronically locking differential, it is finished in Guards Red over black leather and Race-Tex upholstery. The car has 110 miles and is further equipped with LED headlights, a rear wing, rear-axle steering, 20" and 21" forged lightweight magnesium center-locking wheels, a front-axle lift system, carbon-fiber full bucket seats, a Bose sound system, and Porsche Communication Management. This 992 GT3 RS is now offered in New Jersey with a window sticker, the owner's manual, a car cover, two keys, an accident-free Carfax report, and a clean Colorado title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2010 Land Rover Range Rover Sport HSE at No Reserve
description: This 2010 Land Rover Range Rover Sport is a Santorini Black HSE example that remained registered with one owner prior to the selling dealer's 2024 acquisition and now has 75k miles. It is powered by a 5.0-liter V8 driving all four wheels via a six-speed automatic transmission and a dual-range transfer case and is equipped with an electronic air suspension, a locking center differential, 20" alloy wheels, xenon headlights, parking sensors, and a sunroof. Inside, the heated and power-adjustable front seats are trimmed in Ivory leather, and further appointments include heated rear seats, a Harman Kardon sound system, dual-zone automatic climate control, and navigation. This L320 Range Rover Sport is now offered at no reserve in Florida with an accident-free Carfax report and a clean New Hampshire title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2020 Ferrari 812 Superfast
description: This 2020 Ferrari 812 Superfast was initially delivered to Ferrari of Houston in Texas and was ordered with approximately $219k in options, some of which include an Extra Range Matte Canna di Fucile exterior finish with a Matte Rosso Corsa and Nero Daytona livery. Powered by a 6.5-liter F140 V12 connected to a seven-speed F1 dual-clutch automatic transaxle and Ferrari’s E-Diff limited-slip differential, the car has 1,700 miles and is further equipped with adaptive LED headlights, Nero upholstery, 20" ten-spoke racing alloy wheels, four-wheel steering, a front-axle lift system, Capristo exhaust components, Novitec lowering springs and wheel spacers, Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, exterior and interior carbon-fiber trim, an auxiliary passenger display, a parking camera, carbon-fiber racing bucket seats, navigation, and a JBL Professional Hi-Fi sound system. This 812 Superfast was acquired by the owner in 2023 and is now offered in Texas on dealer consignment with a window sticker, the owner's manual, the removed factory exhaust system and springs, two keys, a car cover, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Montana title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2009 Dodge Viper SRT-10 ACR
description: This 2009 Dodge Viper SRT-10 ACR is one of approximately 250 ACR examples produced for the model year. It was acquired by the seller out of California in 2016 and driven at a few track days, and it now has 23k miles. The car is powered by an 8.4-liter V10 linked to a six-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential and is finished in Viper Race Yellow over Black leather and Slate Gray microsuede. Equipment includes a Prefix Stage II Performance Package, KW adjustable coilovers, black 18" and 19" Sidewinder alloy wheels, a front splitter, a rear wing, and a CD stereo. This Viper SRT-10 ACR is offered with a clean Carfax report and a clean Illinois title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 351-Powered 1972 Ford Bronco 4-Speed
description: This 1972 Ford Bronco began life as a half-cab pickup and was modified and refurbished under prior ownership, including the installation of a 351ci Windsor V8, an NP435 four-speed manual transmission, a Dana 20 dual-range transfer case, and a limited-slip differential. The truck has been repainted black and is fitted with a black soft top, LED headlights, a roll bar, and rear wheel arch extensions. It rides on 15" turbine-style wheels and is equipped with a James Duff suspension lift with dual shocks, a body lift, power steering, and front disc brakes. The interior has been reupholstered in black and tan leather and houses a Vintage Air air conditioning system, a center console with cupholders, and a wood-rimmed steering wheel. This Bronco was acquired by the current owner in 2022 and is now offered in Portland, Oregon on dealer consignment with a clean Montana title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1978 Chevrolet Corvette
description: This 1978 Chevrolet Corvette shows 26k miles, and work in 2010 is said to have included refinishing the body and aftermarket aero package in metallic red, rebuilding the 350ci V8, and replacing the Oyster carpeting and leather seat covers along with overhauling the brakes, suspension, and steering systems. The car is further equipped with a three-speed automatic transmission, a Positraction differential, aftermarket engine and exhaust components, and polished 15″ eight-slot alloy wheels along with T-top roof panels, a Kenwood CD stereo, cruise control, power windows, and air conditioning. The car was purchased out of Wisconsin by its current owner in February 2024, and the battery was replaced the following August. This C3 Corvette is now offered in Colorado by the seller on behalf of its owner with a clean Texas title in the name of the owner's LLC.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2023 Porsche Taycan GTS Sport Turismo
description: This 2023 Porsche Taycan GTS Sport Turismo is finished in Frozen Blue Metallic over red leather and is powered by two AC permanent synchronous electric motors that drive the front wheels through a single-speed planetary gearbox and the rear wheels through a two-speed automatic transmission. Equipment includes a 93.4-kWh lithium-ion battery pack, 21" RS Spyder Design wheels, LED Matrix headlights, and Porsche Active Suspension Management in addition to power-adjustable front seats, touchscreen infotainment, Bose audio, and four-zone automatic climate control. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2024, this Taycan GTS Sport Turismo now has 8k miles and is offered with a California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 39k-Mile 1985.5 Ford Mustang SVO
description: This Ford Mustang SVO is one of approximately 438 1985.5 examples, and it has remained registered in California from new through the seller's purchase in 2010. Showing 39k miles, the car is powered by a turbocharged 2.3-liter inline-four paired with a five-speed manual transmission and is finished in Bright Red over Charcoal cloth upholstery. Equipment includes a Traction-Lok limited-slip differential, 16" alloy wheels, power-assisted four-wheel disc brakes, a removable sunroof, articulated front sport seats, a cassette stereo, and air conditioning. This Mustang SVO is offered with a clean Carfax report and a clean California title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 11k-Mile 2008 Ford Mustang Bullitt
description: This 2008 Ford Mustang Bullitt was purchased new by the seller's mother and now has under 11k miles following history in Texas. The car is finished in Dark Highland Green Metallic over Dark Charcoal leather and is powered by a 4.6-liter V8 linked with a five-speed manual transmission and a limited-slip differential. Equipment includes 18" Dark Argent wheels, cruise control, a power-adjustable driver's seat, and a Shaker 500 sound system. This Mustang Bullitt is now offered with a window sticker, service records, a clean Carfax report, and a clean Texas title in the name of the seller's mother.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2001 Yamaha V-Max at No Reserve
description: This 2001 Yamaha V-Max spent time in Indiana before its recent acquisition by the seller, and it now shows 3,300 miles. Powered by a 1,198cc four-stroke V4 paired with a five-speed transmission, the motorcycle wears an imitation carbon-fiber finish with a red vinyl wrap covering the faux fuel tank. It is equipped with an enclosed driveshaft, a V-Boost speed-sensitive intake crossover system, a four-into-two exhaust system, a stepped two-up seat, air-adjustable suspension, triple disc brakes, cast alloy wheels, dual mirrors, and a side stand. The four Mikuni carburetors were reportedly cleaned under current ownership. This VMX12 is offered at no reserve with a tool kit and a clean Wisconsin title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1968 Ford Mustang Fastback 302
description: This 1968 Ford Mustang fastback was initially delivered to Eagal Ford in Stockton, California, and is said to have remained registered in the state through the seller's acquisition in 2021. Its 302ci V8 was overhauled in 2023 and equipped with a Holley four-barrel carburetor, an Edelbrock intake manifold and cylinder heads, and a replacement camshaft, pistons, and bearings. Shifting is through a three-speed automatic transmission. The car was refinished in blue under prior ownership, and the interior houses bench seats trimmed in tan vinyl, blue carpets, and an aftermarket sound system with a Pioneer head unit and an Alpine amplifier, subwoofer, and speakers. Additional features include Legendary Wheel 15" wheels, TCI suspension components, Wilwood front disc brakes, a back-up camera, and air conditioning. This Mustang fastback is now offered with a copy of a Deluxe Marti Report, the owner's manual, dynamometer results, service records, and a clean California title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2005 BMW X5 4.4i at No Reserve
description: This 2005 BMW X5 4.4i has remained registered in California since it was new and now has under 52k miles. It is finished in Highland Green Metallic over gray Dakota leather and is powered by a 4.4-liter V8 that drives all four wheels through a six-speed automatic transmission. Equipment includes the Sport Package, a panoramic sunroof, Park Distance Control, 19" Style 132 wheels, power-adjustable front seats, and dual-zone automatic climate control. Recently acquired by the selling dealer, this X5 is now offered at no reserve with manufacturer's literature, spare floor mats, a clean Carfax report, and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1958 Cadillac Eldorado Biarritz
description: This 1958 Cadillac Eldorado Biarritz is one of 815 examples produced for the model year and is finished in white over two-tone red and white leather upholstery. Power is provided by a 365ci V8 linked with a four-speed Hydra-Matic automatic transmission, and equipment includes a power-operated Ivory soft top, power-assisted drum brakes, chrome-finished 15" Sabre wheels, power steering, a power-adjustable front seat, power windows, power locks, a heater, and aftermarket audio system. The seller purchased the car in 2022 following noted history in a Michigan private collection, and work in 2023 included refreshing the brakes, rebuilding the driveshaft, repairing wiring and the power window system, and replacing the tires, spark plugs and wires, valve cover gaskets, fuel pump, battery, and an exhaust manifold. This Eldorado Biarritz is now offered with manufacturer's literature, a Cadillac data book, a parade boot, a car cover, recent service records, scale models, and a clean Illinois title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 29k-Mile 2015 Toyota 4Runner TRD Pro
description: This 2015 Toyota 4Runner TRD Pro was modified under previous ownership with modular steel front and rear bumpers as well as a Warn front winch, an intake snorkel, a roof basket, front and rear LED light bars, tubular side steps, and a swing-away spare tire carrier with a jerry cans. Finished in Inferno over black SofTex upholstery, the truck is powered by a 4.0-liter V6 linked with a five-speed automatic transmission, a dual-range transfer case, and a locking rear differential. Additional equipment includes 17" TRD alloy wheels, a front skid plate, a receiver hitch, a rearview camera, heated power-adjustable front seats, air conditioning, and navigation. Acquired by the selling dealer in 2024, this N280 4Runner has 29k miles and is offered in California with manufacturer's literature, a clean Carfax report, and a Utah title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1982 Mercedes-Benz 380SL at No Reserve
description: This 1982 Mercedes-Benz 380SL was first registered in New Jersey and has spent time in Illinois and North Carolina, and it now shows 66k miles following the seller's purchase in 2022. The car is powered by a 3.8-liter V8 paired with a four-speed automatic transmission and is finished in China Blue over blue leather upholstery. Equiptment includes a blue soft top, a removable hardtop, 14" Bundt alloy wheels, fog lights, a Becker cassette stereo, electric windows, central locking, and automatic climate control. Work performed since 2022 is said to have included replacing the starter, fuel injectors, warm-up regulator, and fuel distributor. This R107 is offered with partial service records, manufacturer's literature, a clean Carfax report, and a clean North Carolina title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2015 Mercedes-Benz S63 AMG 4MATIC Sedan
description: This 2015 Mercedes-Benz S63 AMG sedan was purchased new by the seller and now has 698k miles. The car is finished in Obsidian Black Metallic over Black Exclusive Nappa leather and is powered by a twin-turbocharged 5.5-liter V8 driving all four wheels through a seven-speed automatic transmission. Equipment includes LED headlights, Parktronic, 20" AMG five-spoke alloy wheels, heated and ventilated power-adjustable front seats, heated and ventilated power-adjustable rear seats, Active Blind-Spot Assist, a head-up display, Active Brake Assist, and a panoramic sunroof. This W222 S63 AMG sedan is now offered with the owner's manual and a clean New York title in the seller's name.
author: bringatrailer

title: 1978 Ford F-250 Custom 4×4 4-Speed
description: This 1978 Ford F-250 Custom pickup was initially delivered to Greiner Ford of Casper, Wyoming, and is said to have remained in the original owner's family before the selling dealer acquired it in 2024. Subsequent work involved reupholstering the bench seat in brown vinyl and installing 16" polished alloy wheels, a Rough Country suspension lift kit, and a RetroSound stereo. The truck is powered by a 351ci V8 mated to a four-speed manual transmission and a dual-range transfer case, and it is further equipped with manually locking front hubs, side steps, a roll bar, a sunroof, and a cabin heater. Finished in Wimbledon White with brown stripes, this F-250 is now offered in North Carolina with a Deluxe Marti report and a clean California title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 46k-Mile 2005 Dodge Ram 3500 SLT Quad Cab Big Horn Cummins 4×4 at No Reserve
description: This 2005 Dodge Ram 3500 SLT is a quad cab pickup powered by a 5.9-liter Cummins turbodiesel inline-six paired with a four-speed automatic transmission and is finished in Bright Silver Metallic (PS2) over Dark Slate Gray cloth. Features include a dual-range transfer case, an anti-spin rear differential, the Big Horn Value Group, the Trailer Tow Group, 17" forged aluminum wheels, an 8' cargo bed, side steps, tow hooks, fog lights, power-adjustable pedals, folding flat cab load storage, air conditioning, and an AM/FM stereo. The selling dealer acquired the truck in 2024 and added approximately 1k of the 46k miles. This Ram 3500 is now offered at no reserve with the owner's manual, two key sets, and a clean Minnesota title.
author: bringatrailer

title: 2007 Ferrari F430 Spider 6-Speed
description: This 2007 Ferrari F430 Spider was initially sold by Continental Autosports of Hinsdale, Illinois, and was optioned from the factory with a six-speed manual transaxle, which is paired with a 4.3-liter DOHC V8. Finished in Rosso Corsa over tan leather upholstery, the car has 19" split-spoke alloy wheels, an electronically controlled limited-slip differential, cross-drilled and ventilated brake rotors, a black soft top, Scuderia Ferrari fender shields, power-adjustable Daytona-style bucket seats, Sony speakers, an aftermarket head unit, a Tubi Style exhaust system, and automatic climate control. The current owner acquired the car in 2023 and has since added approximately 5k of the 45k miles. This F430 Spider is now offered in Utah on dealer consignment with a clean Carfax report and a clean Montana title.
author: bringatrailer
